compliant.section: At AAEON, we are committed to handling your personal information with care and responsibility, while also upholding all relevant data protection laws.
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data (lawfulness, fairness and transparency, purpose limitation, data minimisation, accuracy, storage limitations, integrity and confidentiality), Responsibility of the controller

compliant.section: This policy statement outlines how AAEON collects, uses, and shares personal information about anyone – including customers, clients, business partners, suppliers, and representatives of organizations – with whom AAEON has, or is considering entering into, a business relationship.
compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the data subject's rights, Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject, Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject

compliant.section: The personal information of people living within the EU will be collected in accordance with EU Privacy Legislation, and this may affect your rights – see the Your rights section below.
compliant.legal provisions: Territorial scope

compliant.section: When you visit an AAEON website or use an associated online service, information such as your user name, password, IP address, and personal browser settings will be gathered to ensure you have access to relevant information and services, and also to allow us to operate our websites and comply with relevant legal requirements.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing (compliance with a legal obligation, legitimate interests)

compliant.section: Additionally, to personalize your website experience, information about the way in which you use AAEON websites, such as your preferences and settings, will be recorded.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing (legitimate interests)

compliant.section: This data will help us improve our products and services.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing (legitimate interests)

compliant.section: In order to deliver products and services, provide support, manage contracts, and invoice customers, we collect business contact information for existing and prospective clients, partners, and suppliers.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing (necessary for the performance of a contract, legitimate interests)

compliant.section: This information might include the names, titles/positions, and contact details of staff members, advisors, contractors, and authorized users.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing (necessary for the performance of a contract, legitimate interests)

compliant.section: Whenever you contact AAEON, whether online or otherwise, to order products or services or to ask for information or support, we will record the information we need to fulfill your order or answer your enquiry.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing (necessary for the performance of a contract)

compliant.section: This information might include your name, contact details, a summary of your request or any agreement you have entered into with us, details about the fulfillment of any request or delivery and invoicing of any order, and any information gathered from a client satisfaction survey.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing (necessary for the performance of a contract)

compliant.section: This information will be kept for administrative purposes, to help us serve you better in the future, and to defend our rights.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing (compliance with a legal obligation, legitimate interests)

compliant.section: We record the names and contact details of people who visit AAEON company premises.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing (legitimate interests)

compliant.section: Due to safety, security, and regulatory considerations, security cameras are in operation at company locations.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing (legitimate interests)

compliant.section: AAEON uses “cookies” to collect information when you visit company websites.
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data (lawfulness, fairness and transparency), Recital 30 (Data minimisation)

compliant.section: This information is used to give us an insight into website usage and effectiveness, improve our products and services, and to personalize your online experience.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing (legitimate interests)

compliant.section: When you visit an AAEON website or use an associated online service, you may be able to set your own cookie preferences via your web browser tools and settings.
compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects must be given the ability to manage their own cookies and consent preferences. Websites should be designed with data protection by design and by default principles in mind, allowing users to easily manage their privacy.

compliant.section: Although changing your cookie preferences will not cause cookies already stored on your device to be deleted, you can use your web browser settings to delete cookies.
compliant.legal provisions: Individuals have the right to erasure (right to be forgotten), which includes the deletion of cookies associated with them.

compliant.section: If you want to receive information about AAEON products and services, you can choose to do so via email, telephone, or post, and you can also sign up for a subscription.
compliant.legal provisions: Consent for marketing must be freely given, specific, informed, and unambiguous. Offering multiple channels for opting in aligns with this principle.

compliant.section: You will be able to choose not to have your personal information used in this way.
compliant.legal provisions: Individuals have the right to withdraw consent at any time. They also have the right to object to direct marketing.

compliant.section: You may also choose, at any time, to unsubscribe from marketing updates by following the unsubscribe instructions included in the marketing emails you receive, by informing us of your decision during a marketing call, or by contacting us directly.
compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects have the right to withdraw consent easily. Providing multiple, accessible methods to unsubscribe from marketing communications is crucial.

compliant.section: If, in our communications with you, we state that we have used your personal information in conjunction with a request, order, transaction, or agreement, we will have used the information because it was necessary for the fulfillment of the request, order, transaction, or agreement.
compliant.legal provisions: processing is necessary for the performance of a contract

compliant.section: If we state that we have used your personal information in conjunction with a marketing project or for the development of AAEON products and services for safety, security, or regulatory considerations and not for any reasons connected to an agreement or request, we will have used the information either with your consent or to uphold the legitimate interests of AAEON or a third party.
compliant.legal provisions: Consent of the data subject, legitimate interests

compliant.section: When you visit an AAEON website or use an associated online service, you might be offered personalized information. If you want to stop receiving personalized communications, send an email stating your request to privacy@aaeon.com.tw.
compliant.legal provisions: Right to object, Right to withdraw consent

compliant.section: With your consent, or to help AAEON supply you or your employer with products or services, or to fulfill your requests, we may share your personal information with its partners.
compliant.legal provisions: Consent of the data subject, processing is necessary for the performance of a contract

compliant.section: In the event that AAEON acquires, sells, merges with, or restructures a business or business unit, personal information may be shared with or received from prospective or confirmed buyers, partners, and sellers.
compliant.legal provisions: Legitimate interests

compliant.section: Please be advised that in accordance with judicial proceedings, court orders, or other legal processes, personal information may sometimes have to be handed over to government agencies.
compliant.legal provisions: Legal obligation

compliant.section: If we have reasonable cause to suspect that the rights or property of AAEON or its business partners, suppliers, or clients have been or could be under threat, we may share your personal information if doing so would protect those rights or properties.
compliant.legal provisions: Legitimate interests

compliant.section: AAEON utilizes technical, administrative, and physical protection methods to guard against unauthorized access to, and use or disclosure of your personal information. For example, sensitive data such as credit card details are encrypted before being transferred over the Internet. AAEON also requires its suppliers to take similar precautions.
compliant.legal provisions: Security of processing, processor, Notification of a personal data breach to the supervisory authority

compliant.section: At your request, we will delete information held about you.
compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')

compliant.section: Email privacy@aaeon.com.tw to make such a request.
compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall take appropriate measures to provide any information referred to in Articles 13 and 14 and any communication under Articles 15 to 22 and 34 relating to processing to the data subject in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language, in particular for any information addressed specifically to a child. The information shall be provided in writing, or by other means, including, where appropriate, by electronic means. When requested by the data subject, the information may be provided orally, provided that the identity of the data subject is proven by other means.

compliant.section: You can make a request to access, update, or correct the information AAEON holds about you.
compliant.legal provisions: Right of access by the data subject, Right to rectification

compliant.section: To start the request process, email privacy@aaeon.com.tw.
compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall take appropriate measures to provide any information referred to in Articles 13 and 14 and any communication under Articles 15 to 22 and 34 relating to processing to the data subject in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language, in particular for any information addressed specifically to a child. The information shall be provided in writing, or by other means, including, where appropriate, by electronic means. When requested by the data subject, the information may be provided orally, provided that the identity of the data subject is proven by other means.

compliant.section: You also have the right to object to direct marketing.
compliant.legal provisions: Right to object

compliant.section: In accordance with local law in your region, you may have additional rights regarding the processing of your personal information.
compliant.legal provisions: Acknowledges that there may be other privacy laws applicable

compliant.section: For example, if the collection and use of your personal information is governed by the EU General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR"), your rights allow you to object to any processing of your information even if it was collected and is being processed in a legitimate way.
compliant.legal provisions: Right to object

compliant.section: Under the strictures of the GDPR, you may also have the right to request that your personal information be deleted, its use restricted, or that it be transferred.
compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'), Right to restriction of processing, Right to data portability

compliant.section: For the purposes of the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the controller of your personal information is AAEON Technology Inc., 5F, No. 135, Lane 235, Pao Chiao Rd., Hsin-Tien Dist, New Taipei City, 231, Taiwan, R.O.C., unless indicated otherwise.
compliant.legal provisions: Definition of controller

compliant.section: AAEON Technology Inc. is not the controller of your personal information in situations such as: Your personal information is used in conjunction with a contractual agreement with a specific AAEON subsidiary.
compliant.legal provisions: Definition of controller

compliant.section: The controller of your personal information will then be the AAEON contracting company, the legal entity you or your company has entered or will enter into a contractual agreement.
compliant.legal provisions: Definition of controller

non_compliant.section: AAEON websites do not recognize "do not track" instructions and other automated browser signals regarding tracking mechanisms, but in most cases, you can still use your web browser to define your own privacy settings regarding the use of cookies and similar technologies.
non_compliant.legal provisions: While not explicitly mandatory, GDPR encourages honoring "do not track" signals as a way to respect user choice regarding tracking. The policy should be amended to explore technical feasibility and consider honoring DNT signals as a best practice.
non_compliant.amend: AAEON acknowledges "do not track" signals. While full implementation is under review, users can manage cookie preferences through browser settings. AAEON is committed to providing enhanced user control over tracking mechanisms.

non_compliant.section: How we use your personal information Any personal information we collect will be collated and may be analyzed for marketing purposes.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data must be collected for specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes. The policy should clearly specify the purposes of analyzing data for marketing and ensure it's not overly broad.
non_compliant.amend: How we use your personal information: Personal data collected will be used for the following specific marketing purposes: [List specific purposes, e.g., personalized product recommendations, website analytics to improve user experience]. We will not use your data for any purposes other than those explicitly stated.

non_compliant.section: The sharing of personal information AAEON is a global company, and, in accordance with the AAEON Privacy Policy, the information we collect about you might be shared with subsidiaries in countries where we conduct business. However, such transfers of information are confined to the limits of what is strictly necessary.
non_compliant.legal provisions: General principle for transfers, Transfers on the basis of an adequacy decision, Transfers subject to appropriate safeguards, Derogations for specific situations
non_compliant.amend: The policy should explicitly mention the safeguards in place for international data transfers, such as standard contractual clauses or adequacy decisions. It should also specify the countries where data is transferred.

non_compliant.section: Please be advised that AAEON also sometimes outsources the collection, use, analysis, and processing of personal information to overseas companies.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly identify the subprocessors used and the safeguards in place to ensure GDPR compliance.

non_compliant.section: The international transfer of information You understand and agree to the transfer of your information to AAEON and any of its affiliated companies, which may be based in a different country to you or your company. You further understand and agree to the storage, use, or processing of this information by AAEON or any of its affiliated companies. The transfer, storage, and processing of your information shall be subject to the rules set out in this policy statement and any relevant laws governing the protection of privacy or the security of personal information.
non_compliant.legal provisions: General principle for transfers, Transfers on the basis of an adequacy decision, Transfers subject to appropriate safeguards, Derogations for specific situations
non_compliant.amend: Merely stating user understanding and agreement to data transfers is not sufficient. The policy needs to explicitly mention the legal basis for the transfer, such as standard contractual clauses, adequacy decisions, or specific consent with clear explanation of risks.

non_compliant.section: Unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law, we will hold your personal information for as long as is necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy statement.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Personal data shall be processed in a manner that ensures appropriate security of the personal data, including protection against unauthorised or unlawful processing and against accidental loss, destruction or damage, using appropriate technical or organisational measures ('integrity and confidentiality')
non_compliant.amend: Specify the criteria used to determine retention periods for different categories of data, ensuring they are not excessive and are aligned with the stated purposes.

non_compliant.section: The privacy of minors We do not knowingly collect information about people under the age of thirteen – or the equivalent age in other jurisdictions – without the consent of a parent or guardian.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions applicable to child's consent in relation to information society services
non_compliant.amend: Explicitly state the age of consent for data processing activities, considering the GDPR's default of 16 years and any lower age established by national law in the EU.

non_compliant.section: We also encourage parents and guardians to take an active role in the online activities of any minors in their charge.
non_compliant.legal provisions: While encouraging parental involvement is good practice, it doesn't fully address the GDPR's requirements for obtaining valid consent from minors.
non_compliant.amend: Implement age verification mechanisms or obtain verifiable parental consent for processing children's data, particularly for online services.

non_compliant.section: If you are a minor, please seek the consent of one of your parents or guardians before visiting AAEON websites or using an associated online service.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions applicable to child's consent in relation to information society services
non_compliant.amend: Implement age verification mechanisms or obtain verifiable parental consent for processing children's data, particularly for online services.

non_compliant.section: You may only submit your information if you have the consent of one of your parents or guardians.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions applicable to child's consent in relation to information society services
non_compliant.amend: Implement age verification mechanisms or obtain verifiable parental consent for processing children's data, particularly for online services.

non_compliant.section: Your parents or guardians can, at any time, revoke any consent previously given.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions applicable to child's consent in relation to information society services
non_compliant.amend: Provide a clear and accessible mechanism for parents or guardians to revoke consent and request deletion of their child's data.
